_source.complaint_what_happened:
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX  XXXX XXXX, NY XXXX XXXX XXXX Date To : Macys XXXX Inc XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX, NY XXXX Attn : XXXX XXXX Executive Office Dear XXXX XXXX, My name is XXXX XXXX, and I am writing to address the ongoing issues with my Macys credit account ( Account Number : XXXX ). Despite multiple attempts to resolve these matters over the phone, I have not received the necessary assistance to correct the inaccuracies on my account. 

XXXX. Disputed Charge and Lack of Support : I have called Macys customer service many times to dispute a charge of {$31.00} and address other concerns. Each time, the representatives were either unwilling or unable to assist me effectively. Macys should have records of these calls to verify my repeated efforts. 
XXXX. Late Fee : I acknowledge the late fee of {$31.00} charged on XX/XX/year>, and its subsequent credit on XX/XX/year>. However, this does not resolve the main issue of incorrect reporting. 
XXXX Credit Reporting Inaccuracy : My account was reported as 30 days delinquent in XX/XX/year>. I have consistently disputed this information, stating that payments for XXXX and XX/XX/year> were made but not properly applied to my account. 

Additional Impact : Due to this delinquency on my credit report, my auto insurance increased to {$330.00} per month. This has been a significant financial burden. 

I request that Macys conduct a comprehensive review, including the phone call records, and correct the inaccuracies on my account. Additionally, I request the removal of the disputed by consumer note from my credit report once the issue is resolved. 

Additionally, I do not want any Macys advertisements sent to my apartment. 

I hope to resolve this matter amicably and promptly. Thank you for your attention to this important issue. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX

_source.complaint_what_happened:
On XX/XX/XXXX, I booked a trip on XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX, but right after I paid, I realized that Ive put the wrong dates by mistake I was very worried because I did see the non-refundable policy from this property on the detail page. And I also checked the correct dates were actually not available to book, so there was no way to ask for a modification of my booking. Since it was midnight and no XXXX customer agents were available at that time, I only had to contact XXXX  credit card customer service to ask if there was anything they could do to help me with this case. 

The agent on the call, the agent assured me that in this case, I could wait a few days for the pending charge to be posted, and cancel the service and submit a dispute, and eventually get money back with XXXX help. I was hopeful from what the agent told me, so I did what she told me to do, saw the pending charge posted on XX/XX/XXXX, canceled the stay with XXXX the same day, tried to work with them to get the dates modified or get the full refund but all failed. So I submitted a dispute, hoping to get my money back through my bank. After waiting for a few months, I got a rejection from XXXX for my dispute. I called XXXX customer service again to explain what happened and what the previous agent promised me. The new agent asked me to re-open the dispute by submitting supporting documents, which I did what she said. The case was re-opened but I was not being contacted or notified for the final results. I have been tracking the dispute process on my app though for a few months, and no updates until recently, the case was closed quietly. No notification, no contact from the bank, it secretly closed. And of course, I did not get my money back or even get an explanation. 

Since I did not actually stay at the property, I believe they did not have any losses due to this however, I lost {$XXXX} for nothing. XXXX it was caused by my own mistake in the first place, but I acted very quickly to try to correct the mistake, although the policy was too strict for me to do so. Moreover, what the first agent told me made me feel confident to get my money back with XXXX help, which turned out to be not, which is very frustrating : (. And the fact that no communication afterward is also frustrating. I hope XXXX  can help me get my money back as I indeed did not use the service at all. 

Also I was unfortunately impacted by a mass layoff in XX/XX/XXXX, and not yet found a job due to the harsh market. {$XXXX} bucks would really mean a lot to me at this challenging time. I sincerely appreciate it.
